title: Beware, Propaganda Is Everywhere (Ep 1714)
description:
Beware, propaganda about both the Ukraine war, and the vaccine, is everywhere. In this episode, I address the details of the disturbing study that just came out about the Pfizer vaccine. 

News Picks:


A troubling study about the Pfizer vaccine.


Illinois turns itself into a dictatorship, and threatens the trucker convoy for their protests. 

Is there a market crash coming? 

What are thermobaric bombs?


Donald Trump wins the CPAC straw poll.
